title: Lemon Herb Sheet-Pan Chicken
author: Mara Lewis
summary: Bright, herby chicken with blistered veggies and a quick pan sauce.
steps: Toss potatoes, onion, and lemon with olive oil, garlic, salt, and pepper.
Nestle chicken thighs on the tray and sprinkle with rosemary.
Roast for 35-40 minutes until chicken is golden and cooked through.
Spoon pan juices over everything and serve warm.
notes: Swap in zucchini or fennel for the vegetables if you have them.

title: Ginger-Lime Glazed Salmon
author: Jun Park
summary: Sticky-sweet glaze with crisp snap peas and fragrant rice.
steps: Whisk soy sauce, honey, ginger, lime zest, and lime juice.
Sear salmon skin-side down for 4 minutes, flip, and glaze.
Add snap peas to the pan and cook until crisp-tender.
Spoon extra glaze over salmon and serve with rice.
notes: Use maple syrup instead of honey for a deeper sweetness.
